summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing for Hot Tubs filter functionality and Product Detail color swatch image changing. All 10 requested features tested successfully.

integration_issues.issue: Console shows 429 (rate limit) error for some image requests from smushcdn.com domain - external CDN rate limiting
Console shows hydration warnings about span inside option/select - related to dynamic series options rendering. Does not affect functionality.

passed_tests: Hot Tubs page: Filter panel expands when clicking 'Filters' button - PASS
Hot Tubs page: Brand filter has 'All Brands', 'Grand River Spas', 'Viking Spas' options - PASS
Hot Tubs page: Min price filter has options (No Min, $5,000, $7,000, $9,000, $10,000) - PASS
Hot Tubs page: Max price filter has options (No Max, $7,000, $9,000, etc.) - PASS
Hot Tubs page: Price filters work - filtering by $9,000 min reduced from 27 to 14 products - PASS
Hot Tubs page: Capacity filter has '1-3 Person', '4-6 Person', '7+ Person' options - PASS
Hot Tubs page: Series and Seating Layout filters visible and functional - PASS
Hot Tubs page: Sort dropdown has Featured, Price Low/High, Name A-Z, Most Jets options - PASS
Hot Tubs page: Sorting by price low shows cheapest products first (Manistee $6,599, Swift $6,995) - PASS
Hot Tubs page: Products separated into 'Grand River Spas' and 'Viking Spas' sections - PASS
Product detail: Clicking shell color swatch (opal) updates the product image - PASS
Product detail: Clicking cabinet color swatch (barnwood, black) updates the product image - PASS
Product detail: Checkmarks appear on selected shell and cabinet colors - PASS
Product detail: Brand name 'Grand River Spas' displays above 'Premier Series' - PASS
Product detail: Viking Spas product shows brand name and Elite Series correctly - PASS
Product detail: Viking-specific cabinet colors (Stone, Slate, Chestnut) available - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Color selector component properly implemented with checkmarks using Lucide Check icon
colorImages mapping correctly changes product images based on shell-cabinet combinations
Filter panel uses Framer Motion for smooth expand/collapse animation
Brand sections properly separated using array filtering (grandRiverProducts, vikingProducts)
Sort functionality works correctly with sortProducts helper function
Minor: React hydration warning about span inside option - could be cleaned up by avoiding dynamic spans in select options
seed_data_creation: N/A - Frontend only with static product data in products.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All filter and color swatch features are working. Hot Tubs page has working filters (brand, price, capacity, series, seating), sort options (featured, price, name, jets), and brand separation (Grand River Spas and Viking Spas sections). Product detail pages have color swatches that change images when clicked - checkmarks appear on selected colors. Both Grand River Spas (gr-* products) and Viking Spas (vs-* products) color selectors working correctly.
